DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to assess bioequivalence of a potential generic 1 mg granisetron tablet formulation compared with Roche Laboratories' 1 mg granisetron tablet, Kytril, following a single 1 mg dose, under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose, 4-Period, 2-Treatment Replicate Design Bioequivalency Study of Granisetron Hydrochloride 1 mg Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening. Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to granisetron or any other comparable or similar drug.
DOC.keyword: Prevention of nausea and vomiting associated with radiation or chemotherapy
